title: Breanna Nguyễn
text:
Hi! I am currently a senior research data tech in the Moral Attitudes and Decisions Lab at Duke University. I have a strong passion for research and am always seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills. I aim to apply to PhD programs this upcoming cycle. I am broadly interested in moral cognition, computational ethics, and data science.
Education
Yale University | New Haven, CT | 2021-2025
Bachelor of Science in Cognitive Science
Certificate in Data Science
